function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to graphene family materials with antiviral properties","Impact":"Potential for unintended exposure and health risks","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols and protective measures when handling graphene family materials","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), ventilation systems","People":"Researchers, laboratory workers, manufacturing personnel","Owner":"Research institutions, manufacturing companies"},{"Description":"Modification of properties using polymeric material and MNPs","Impact":"Potential for unpredictable changes in material behavior and impact on antiviral properties","Mitigation":"Thoroughly test and validate modified materials for their antiviral properties before use","Technologies":"Material testing equipment, characterization tools","People":"Researchers, materials scientists, product developers","Owner":"Research institutions, companies developing antiviral coatings"},{"Description":"Mechanism of action of GBNs against viruses","Impact":"Potential for unintended negative effects on viruses and other microorganisms","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research to understand the specific mechanisms and potential side effects of GBNs","Technologies":"Microscopy, spectroscopy, molecular biology techniques","People":"Biomedical researchers, virologists, microbiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
